Viewing Item Details

For every application component, including Audit, clicking the Detail tab displays information about the item selected from the upper pane. Although no additional information appears, the format is different.

The Detail pane shows two column headers:

  • The Property column, which lists all the fields used as column headers in the upper pane. These fields appear in vertical rather than horizontal format.

  • The Value column, which shows specific values for the fields listed in the Property column.

Even when requirements, tasks, and topics appear in tree format on the upper pane, the Detail pane lists all fields that would have appeared for a selected item in list format.

Unlike the History, Link, and Label panes, the Details pane has no context menu.
